modleR 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Cleans the occurrence records

clean.Rd

A function to remove the points that are outside the extension of the raster and to maintain at most one register per pixel.

clean(occurrences, lon = "lon", lat = "lat", predictors,
  clean_dupl = FALSE, clean_nas = FALSE, clean_uni = FALSE)

Arguments

occurrences

A data frame with occurrence data. Data must have at least columns with latitude an longitude values of species occurrences. See coordenadas as an example.
lon

The name of the longitude column. Defaults to "lon".
lat

The name of the latitude column. Defaults to "lat".
predictors

An object with the rasters to be cut. Accepts an object of type RasterStack, generated by the function stack.
clean_dupl

logical. If TRUE removes points with the same longitude and latitude
clean_nas

logical. If TRUE removes points that are outside the bounds of the raster
clean_uni

logical. If TRUE selects only one point per pixel

Value

data.frame containing longitude and latitude.

Details

Used internally in function setup_sdmdata.

See also

cellFromXY, mask, extract

Examples

occs <- coordenadas[[1]]
clean(occurrences = occs, predictors = example_vars,
      clean_dupl = TRUE,
      clean_nas = TRUE,
      clean_uni = TRUE)
